Name: My Name is Mayo
About the game: If you are looking for a next generation gameplay experience and an engrossing open world environment...!!! Well, this is not that game... This is the touching story about a Mayo Jar. This is a clicking adventure that simulates the real-life tapping of a Mayo Jar! You will unveil its story and (maybe) you will learn from it, while you unlock 50 achievements!! Key Features Unlock Random Facts! Discover the 4 different stories! Unlock 50 unique achievements! Collect the hand-made Steam Trading Cards! Compete with your friends and the world with the online leaderboard!
